item.title: Why I ditched Ubuntu ?

item.title: What YouTube Tutorials Don't Tell You About DevOps & SRE (A Fresher's POV).
item.description: This article highlights the gap between idealized YouTube tutorials and real-world DevOps/SRE work, emphasizing fundamentals, debugging, and system reliability over superficial projects.
